channel.title: NPC Speak help
channel.description:
Ok. I have the Allstar Scape source... and I've seen this is a big problem for lots of people.. I can't get the Genies or ANY npc in the game to change what they say.
I went into npchandler.java and changed the Genies to say "Welcome to myserver". I saved then compiled. I then ran my server and they still said "Welcome to AllstarScape"
I know I compiled right because it said all files compiled correctly and I can change other stuff in the server, but not what NPCs say.. Any help please?
EDIT: NEVER MIND :D There was an error in my coding in client.java and because of the error, it never FULLY compiled. Once I fixed the errors it fully compiled and it worked :D

item.title: NPC Speak help
item.dc:creator: @Rej3ctz Rej3ctz
item.description:
@Rej3ctz wrote:

Go to Class.java and edit it there… Loozl;

item.title: NPC Speak help
item.dc:creator: @iPENGUIN iPENGUIN
item.description:
@iPENGUIN wrote:

Ok. I have the Allstar Scape source… and I’ve seen this is a big problem for lots of people… I can’t get the Genies or ANY npc in the game to change what they say.

I went into npchandler.java and changed the Genies to say “Welcome to myserver”. I saved then compiled. I then ran my server and they still said “Welcome to AllstarScape”

I know I compiled right because it said all files compiled correctly and I can change other stuff in the server, but not what NPCs say… Any help please?

EDIT: NEVER MIND There was an error in my coding in client.java and because of the error, it never FULLY compiled. Once I fixed the errors it fully compiled and it worked
